snippet: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy of Connecticut signed a bill into law that lifts the state’s ban on mixed martial arts events starting Oct. 1.
abstract: Connecticut Gov Dannel P Malloy signs bill into law that lifts state’s ban on mixed martial arts events starting Oct 1, 2013.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy of Connecticut signed a bill into law that lifts the state’s ban on mixed martial arts events starting Oct. 1.

headline.main: Connecticut Lifts Ban on Mixed Martial Arts Fights
